name: Project Overview
content:
Primary Objective:


Develop a B2B customer segmentation strategy using k-means clustering to better understand and target different customer groups.


Secondary Objectives:

  • Identify key features influencing customer behavior and preferences.
  • Provide actionable insights for marketing and sales teams to enhance customer engagement.
  • Optimize product recommendations and marketing strategies for each customer segment.


Continuous Improvement:


  • Encourage a continuous improvement mindset, where the project evolves based on feedback and changing business needs.
  • This project overview provides a roadmap for leveraging the k-means algorithm to segment B2B customers, ultimately improving marketing and sales strategies for enhanced customer engagement.
